videos.description: J'Von McCormick connects with Devan Cambridge for a pair of alley-oops in Auburn's 74-51 win vs. Lehigh.
videos.headline: Cambridge flushes 2 monster alley-oops for Auburn

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCB Highlight (Cambridge flushes 2 monster alley-oops for Auburn) 2019/12/21 ESHEET SOTFULL
